text: Glumilino () is a rural locality (a village) in Taptykovsky Selsoviet, Ufimsky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 64 as of 2010. There are 7 streets. == Geography == It is located 26 km from Ufa, 4 km from Taptykovo. == References == Category:Rural localities in Ufimsky District
title: Glumilino
